mr.robotto.components.comp

Class MrMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • mr.robotto.components.comp.MrComponent
      • mr.robotto.components.comp.MrMesh
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MrAxis

    public class MrMesh
extends MrComponent
    This class represents a 3D Mesh and allows to draw it

      MrBuffer vertexBuffer,
      MrBuffer indexBuffer)
        Creates a new mesh
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the mesh
        count - Number of faces
        drawType - Used drawtype
        keys - Buffer keys of this mesh
        vertexBuffer - Vertex data as a buffer
        indexBuffer - Vertex indices data as a buffer
